sentence.Network_en: Some people want to legalize the possession of cannabis.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些人想将私有大麻合法化.

sentence.Network_en: The function of institution is to legalize the necessary transaction cost.
sentence.Network_cn: 制度的功能是让必要的交易费用合法化,让暧昧的交易费用规范化,让隐性的交易费用透明化,以使制度去适应日趋复杂化的组织以及日益增大的交易费用.

sentence.Network_en: The Albanian government says it plans to legalize same - sex marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿尔巴尼亚政府说它想要使同性恋婚姻合法化.

entry.tran: 使合法化；使得到法律认可
entry.def: If something is legalized, a law is passed that makes it legal.

example.ex: ...the decision of the Georgian government to legalise multi-party elections.
example.tran: 格鲁吉亚政府让多党选举合法化的决定
